name: **Inishgowla**
description: Inishgowla L914-911 Sheet 30 A fine substantial island. It has a classic horsehoe shaped topography, beloved of the hill walker. In the coum is a valley and even a lake. By the lake are the remants of 2/3 houses. Sheep, Shelduck, ash and beech trees around the remnants. Camping and swimming on E facing beach centre E side.
